CDAC Lab Resources

This page includes links to resources for lab members.

OKRs | Expectations | Papers in Progress | Checklists for writing papers

Last revised: 2023-01-05

Lab OKRs

Periodically (typically every 3-6 months) members of the lab draft “objectives and key results”. The lab PI also writes a set of OKRs for the lab. You can read about OKRs here. The lab OKRs are accessible to lab members here. Request access by emailing Brandon.
Back to Top

Papers in Progress

A list of manuscripts that are planned or in progress, and anticipated authorship lists is here. Request access by emailing Brandon.
Back to Top

Checklists for writing papers

STROBE checklist - Strengthening The Reporting of Observational studies in Epidemiology
CLAIM checklist and paper - Checklist for Artificial Intelligence in Medical Imaging
IJMEDI/ChAMAI checklist and paper - Checklist for Assessment of Medical AI
TRIPOD checklist and paper - Transparent Reporting of a multivariable prediction model for Individual Prognosis Or Diagnosis
TRIPOD+ paper Guidance for reporting validation studies of predictive models (highly recommended)
CONSORT checklist - CONsolidated Standards Of Reporting Trials
CONSORT diagram template - flow diagram for study inclusion / exclusion
